data.eml:eml: Cave millipedes of the United States. XVI. Two new species from Oregon Caves National Monument, Oregon (Chordeumatida, Conotylidae and Caseyidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shear, William A., Crawford, Rodney L. (2019): Cave millipedes of the United States. XVI. Two new species from Oregon Caves National Monument, Oregon (Chordeumatida, Conotylidae and Caseyidae). Zootaxa 4674 (5): 571-580, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4674.5.6
